Warehouse Chief Natools: On behalf of Shadow Fox's organization, you must choose either the request of the Temple of Einhasad and the Rulers of Dawn or the request of the Preachers of the Wilderness and the Revolutionaries of Dusk. Choose carefully -- there is no going back...
